subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Telefonica Blue of Spain won the third leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, closing the gap on the overall leader, Ericsson 4 of Sweden, during the 1,950 nautical miles from Kochi, India, to Singapore. The United States team, Puma Ocean Racing, arrived second. It was 1:47 ahead of Sweden’s Ericsson 3, which beat Ericsson 4 by 40 seconds after more than nine days of racing. The teams are scheduled to leave Singapore on Jan. 18 for Qingdao, China, on the fourth stage of the around-the-world race.
